title: Taras Petrivskyi
text: Taras Petrivskyi (; born 3 February 1984, <a href="Stryi">Stryi</a>, <a href="Lviv%20Oblast">Lviv Oblast</a>, <a href="Ukrainian%20SSR">Ukrainian SSR</a>, <a href="Soviet%20Union">Soviet Union</a>) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Nyva%20Ternopil">FC Nyva Ternopil</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a>.
